ygData.subject: Re: (OT) While we're talking viruses
ygData.msgSnippet: The worst part about this is that they haven t even informed anyone via login or on their website that they downloaded the infected files.  So anyone who
ygData.messageBody:
The worst part about this is that they haven't even
informed anyone via login or on their website that
they downloaded the infected files. So anyone who
doesn't read these boards may not even know they are
infected. This is highly irresponsible of Verant. I
sent an email to gordon--I assume his is
gwrinn@.... I have not heard back. I've also
posted to the gameplay forum on the everquest site.

The least they can do is inform everyone that they may
have a virus on their machine so they can clean it.
The virus is fairly benign but it is still inexcusable
to not let the public know that they may be infected.
Re-patching will not help if you have already opened
the files because the virus will propagate to other
doc files on your system.

Thex Luteslinger (Tunare)
40th level bard

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Talies the Wanderer
> [mailto:snicker@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 25, 2000 3:32 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] (OT) While we're talking viruses
>
>
> It is important that you know that the Ruins of
> Kunark CD *may* have
> included a Word Macro virus embedded in the new
> documents. If so, here is
> the information on the virus:
>
> http://vil.mcafee.com/dispVirus.asp?virus_k=10003
>
> Now, I say "may" because it's possible that the
> infected file came from the
> patch center. In either case, Abashi has stated
> that if you didn't open
> the doc file, you are fine. If you did, you are SOL
> - Verant is keeping
> mum about a solution. Of course, you should always
> have a virus scanner
> running (says the guy without one) and never open
> anything from someone you
> don't know and/or trust (yadda yadda). Thanks for
> shooting THAT one in the
> foot, Verant :P.
>
> Good luck to you RoK'ers - I'm not able to upgrade,
> so I won't be seeing
> you there.
>
> Talies the Wanderer
